panels.description: Mémoria heap utilizada

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="heap"}) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="heap"})

panels.title: HEAP USED

panels.description: Utilização de CPU
panels.title: CPU UTILIZATION

panels.description: Memória non-heap utilizada

targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="nonheap"}) * 100 / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", area="nonheap"})

panels.title: NON-HEAP USED

panels.description: Média de uso de CPU

panels.description: Warning e erros logados nos últimos 5 minutos.

panels.title: TOTAL REQUESTS

panels.description: Taxa de erro nos últimos 5 minutos

targets.expr: sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="500"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="400"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus", status="404"}[5m])) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[5m]))

panels.title: ERROR RATE

panels.description: Tempo de resposta no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", uri!="/actuator/prometheus"}[1m])

panels.title: RESPONSE TIME

panels.description: Número de requisições por endpoint no último minuto
panels.title: REQUEST COUNT

panels.description: Duração média de requisições no último minuto

targets.expr: rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/topicos/{id}"}[1m])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="$application", instance="$instance", job="app-forum-api", status="200", uri="/auth"}[1m])

panels.title: AVERAGE REQUEST DURATION

panels.description: Duração máxima de uma requisição
panels.title: MAX REQUEST DURATION
